The video was originally published by In: reporting on armed men brandishing guns during the last day of filing nominations for local village elections in West Bengal.
The misleading video has been posted by: 3. The claim on Facebook alleges that armed men were forcing people to attend a political rally hosted by the Trinamool Congress (TMC) party in Kolkata.
Other media outlets: such as news18, also reported on the election-related violence in April 2018, supporting the authenticity of the video.
